column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////It does take about 45 minutes
column2: but it is well worth the wait.  For times when its crazy packed (like Saturday)
column3: they take your name and start your pizza so by the time you get a table
column4: your pizza is almost ready.  And for all those people that whine about how long it takes to make - maybe they should just stop eating deep dish and giving low-star reviews.  That is just how long it takes to make.
